subject: Automobile Racing
Hungarian Grand Prix (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: Busch edged Ryan Blaney on the last lap, making an inside pass on the back straightaway, to win the Lilly Diabetes 250, an Xfinity Series race, by 0.421 of a second at Indianapolis Motor Speedway.
